sentences.en: Ashurst's hair was smooth, pale, wavy.
sentences.cn: 艾舍斯特的头发着淡灰色, 光溜溜的带着波纹.

sentences.en: Double dark coral ruffled Large. Dark green, wavy. Large.
sentences.cn: 重瓣深珊瑚色大朵折边花. 深绿色波浪叶. 大型.

sentences.en: His wavy hair was too long and flopped just beneath his brow.
sentences.cn: 他的波浪式头发太长了,正好垂在他的眉毛下.

sentences.en: Mary has a head of thick, lustrous, wavy brown hair.
sentences.cn: 玛丽有一头浓密、富有光泽的褐色鬈发。

sentences.en: Our follicles produce hair that is straight, wavy or curly.
sentences.cn: 我们的毛囊生产的毛有直的, 波浪式的或卷曲的.

sentences.en: Semidouble white ruffled pansy. Medium green wavy, quilted, scalloped. Standard.
sentences.cn: 半重瓣堇型花,白色边稍绉折. 中绿色波浪叶, 叶脉向上气状鼓起, 贝壳型叶型.标准型.

sentences.en: She drew a wavy line under the word.
sentences.cn: 她在这个词的下面画了一条波纹线.

sentences.en: She had short, wavy brown hair.
sentences.cn: 她留着微卷的褐色短发。

sentences.en: She is a woman with wavy black hair and dancing eyes.
sentences.cn: 她有一头波浪般的黑发和一双神采飞扬的眼睛.

sentences.en: Single - semi double dark coral - rose Large frilled star. Dark green, wavy. Standard.
sentences.cn: 单瓣到半重瓣的深色珊瑚色到玫瑰色的大朵折边星形花. 深绿色波浪叶. 标准型.

sentences.en: The boxes were decorated with a wavy gold line.
sentences.cn: 这些盒子上饰有波浪形的金边。

sentences.en: The sea is very wavy today.
The wavy plate heat exchanger is a new type heat transfer device.
sentences.cn: 波面板换热器是一种新型的换热设备,具有广泛的应用前景.
